settings.question: How do I qualify for free shipping?
settings.answer: Free shipping on all domestic orders over $1,000. Under $1,000 standard shipping rates apply.

settings.question: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use UPS for all domestic and international shipping.

settings.question: Can I track my order?
settings.answer: Yes! Once your order ships you will receive an email with a tracking number.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship via UPS Worldwide Express. Customs duties and taxes are the responsibility of the customer.

settings.question: What should I do if my package is lost or damaged?
settings.answer: If your package is lost or damaged during transit, please contact our Customer Service team at care@stienhardt.com. We will help you resolve the issue.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Domestic orders over $1,000 take 2 business days via UPS Second Day Air. International orders take 3-5 business days via UPS Worldwide Express.

settings.all-sold-out-text: Please choose and update the products as per availability!
settings.guest-customer-message: Please login to save your wishlist
